subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: The former champion Novak Djokovic was beaten in his opening match at the Sony Ericsson Open in Key Biscayne, Fla., losing to Olivier Rochus, 6-2, 6-7 (7), 6-4.
snippet: The former champion Novak Djokovic was beaten in his opening match at the Sony Ericsson Open in Key Biscayne, Fla., losing to Olivier Rochus, 6-2, 6-7 (7), 6-4.
